title: Death from amphetamine drug use in England and Wales 1993 to 2018
summary: In general Number of deaths has rose over the Year.
The line rapidly increased by 82.14% from Year 2001 to 2002.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2013 and 2014.
The highest Number of deaths, of value 90.0 was reached at Year 2015
Minimum Number of deaths about 28.0 was reached at Year 2001
